snippet.title: STAR OVERDRIVE - Release date trailer
snippet.description:
🛹 Get ready to ride! Star Overdrive lands on Nintendo Switch on April 10, 2025 🔥
Explore a stunning alien world, customize your hoverboard, and outsmart massive foes in epic battles. Stay tuned for more updates! 🎸

⌛ What is STAR OVERDRIVE about?
Journey to the galaxy's depths in this high-speed sci-fi epic!
After receiving a mysterious distress signal, you'll embark on a daring adventure through an alien world, uncovering secrets hidden in its depths. Ride your stylish Hoverboard to traverse stunning landscapes filled with alien structures, from scorching sands to wavy waters, each testing your traversal skills to the limit.

Star Overdrive is developed by Caracal Games and published by Dear Villagers
Song: Gravity Damage Performed by: Star Overdrive


Follow us:
💙 X: https://x.com/star_overdrive
🧡 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/star_overdrive/
💙 Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@star_overdrive
🧡 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61560770525416

#StarOverdrive #adventuregame
